SEARCH

Package com.studiomediatech.queryresponse

package com.studiomediatech.queryresponse
The core package in Query/Response for Spring AMQP, providing access to the configuration and builder types that can be used to build Query/Response solutions.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.studiomediatech.queryresponse.util
    Collection of mostly internal helper and utility types.
  • Class
    Description
    ChainingQueryBuilder<T>
    Provides the entry to the fluid builder for queries, with the ChainingQueryBuilder.queryFor(java.lang.String, java.lang.Class<T>) method.
    ChainingResponseBuilder<T>
    Providing the entry-point to the fluid builder for responses, through the ChainingResponseBuilder.respondTo(String, Class) method.
    EnableQueryResponse
    Enables support for Query/Response with AMQP or RabbitMQ as the shared broker.
    QueryBuilder
    The main entry type for query building, provides static factory methods to create a chaining query builder.
    QueryResponseConfigurationProperties
    Configuration properties for Query/Response.
    QueryResponseConfigurationProperties.ExchangeProperties
    Configuration properties that declares and defines the topic exchange resources to be used.
    QueryResponseConfigurationProperties.QueueProperties
    Configuration properties that pertain to declared and generated queue resources.
    QueryResponseConfigurationProperties.StatsProperties
    Encapsulates the settings for the statistics and metrics gathering.
    QueryResponseTopicExchange
    Custom topic exchange type.
    ResponseBuilder
    The main entry type for response building, provides static factory methods to create a chaining response builder.
